Entries.default: "What do you suppose words taste like? Paper, I suppose."
"That will stain the books for certain."
"I doubt that they will limit themselves to books when flesh is available. Be careful."
"Remaro'd cry four rivers over this. Books be the treasure of the mind, that sad salt used to say."
"Aw, Hel. Hope nobody was planning on reading these."
"My people would not allow an infestation like this to spread unchecked."
"Heartbreaking. I doubt the finest archivists in the Republics could restore these tomes."
"So much knowledge consumed and grown over. We may never appreciate how much was lost here."
"Scribes spent years of their lives on each of these books. And now look at them. Fools."
